import React, {Component} from "react"; import {API_URL} from '../api/constant' import { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const CreateBillComponent = () => { const [state, setState] = useState({ totalAmount: 0, debtors: [], type: '', comment: '', receipt: null }) const navigate = useNavigate() const handleSubmit = ()=>{ const billFormData = new FormData(); billFormData.append() axios.post(`${API_URL}/create_bill`,billFormData,{headers:{'content-type': 'multipart/form-data'}}) .then(navigate(-1)) } return (

create new bill

) } export default CreateBillComponent;
